display_long_description:
Among Us 3D is a party game of teamwork and betrayal. Grab your crew and headset and launch into the VR version of this hit multiplayer game for 4 - 10 players. Work together as Crewmates to complete tasks before one or more Impostors kill everyone aboard. 

[media]
Experience the core Among Us gameplay you know and love, such as tasks, sabotages, emergency meetings, and venting — now in VR!

Play as either Crewmate or Impostor.

— Crewmate Mission: Complete all the tasks or find the Impostor. Keep your eyes and ears open since there is always someone lurking right around the corner.

— Impostor Mission: Kill and sabotage the Crewmates! Be as sneaky as possible and lie, lie, lie.

[media]
Team up with or betray your friends using your preferred method of communication:

— Native, proximity voice chat! No more need for external apps for Crewmate/Impostor discord, err… discourse!

— Yap away with intuitive and efficient Quick Text Chat options.

[media]
Fashion your beansona with a growing wardrobe of cosmetics. Show off your own unique style with an endless number of color, hat, gloves, and skin combinations!

Even more cosmetics are available with additional purchases.

[media]
Enjoy brand new and returning favorite minigames, reimagined with innovative and immersive VR-friendly controls, as you complete tasks as a Crewmate. Customize your gameplay, locomotion, comfort, and safety settings to build the best experience possible for you!
